rentals.name: Honda Metro Scooter
rentals.description: This popular scooter is great for single riders. Amazing fuel economy for the whole day and enough power to have lots of fun! Fits 1.

rentals.name: Honda Dio Scooter
rentals.description: This is another great choice for a two seater scooter. Very economic and fun to use around the city. This is a great choice if you are with a partner. Fits 2.

rentals.name: Honda PCX150 Scooter
rentals.description: Our Most powerful scooter. Perfect for two people who like going fast in tight spaces. This is a great choice if you want to explore the city. Fits 2.

rentals.name: Honda Pioneer ATV
rentals.description: Our most popular choice for families. You can go anywhere with the Honda Pioneer including the beach, city, and any trail in Cozumel! Fits 4.

rentals.name: Jeep Wrangler - 4 door with a/c
rentals.description: This is another great option for families, especially with younger kids. It's all the fun of a Pioneer ATV, but with a comfortable air conditioned cabin. Fits 5.

rentals.name: Jeep Wrangler - 2 door
rentals.description: This is a step up from the Pioneer ATV. You get a great outdoors expereience with out open-aired two-door jeep. Fits 4 people. Great choice if you're with a group of friends.
